tr.td: The whole number representing the percent of pings that returned back for a remote.ping check. (ex: 60)
The average response time for all ping packets sent out and later retrieved. (ex: 0.0002513333359578)
The number of ping ping's returned. (ex: 5)
The maximum roundtrip time of an ICMP packet. (ex: 0.0002770000137389)
The minimum roundtrip time of an ICMP packet. (ex: 0.0002329999988433)
